text: @SenSchumer Nah, Dems own this. Blk people are 3x more likely to die/get sick from Covid19 than whites, yet you said/did nothing while thousands of people marched. I guess now that the riots are dying down & GF will have his 5th & final memorial Tues, it's time to get back to the pandemic.
